[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterward. It's awkward, so I can't go to that shopping street for a while. … Well, if you say it's because of the cat's cute side, then that's true.

Vanilla: "Hm? Kunkun, kunkun…"

Vanilla: "There's a really good smell coming from over there."

Chocola: "You're right, it's very fragrant and smells great, ご主人さま!"

Minaduki Kashou: "Indeed. This smell is…"

She turns her face toward the direction of the scent.

Cat at stall: "Welcome!"

Cat at stall: "Freshly made takoyaki, would you like some?"

Cat at stall: "Hot and loaded with bonito flakes, how about that?"

Chocola: "Wow, a cat's takoyaki shop! That's rare, ご主人さま!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Shocola: "I want you to become a good child!"
Vanilla: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."
Shopkeeper: "Is that so? You're a good master, aren't you?"
Shocola: "Ah, but the master is still the master!"
Shocola: "Because Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "In translation, Shigure is an important friend."
Vanilla: "Calling someone 'Master' only refers to this Master here."
Shopkeeper: "Ahaha. You're being loved, aren't you, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, fortunately..."
He is lightly poked with his elbow.
He returns a shy smile and replies.
...outside, it's still somewhat embarrassing.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
Merciless electronic tones echo as I stare at my cellphone.
…I thought that if I just got in touch with Shigure, it would be solved right away.

ショコラ: "Hamu, mungun‑gun‑gu, breakfast is so tasty!"
ショコラ: "Master's food is always delicious, nya~♪"

バニラ: "Chocola, ketchup is on your cheek."
バニラ: "Artistically cute. I'll lick it for you. Pero perō."

They themselves are happily munching on a sandwich.
By the way, the filling is tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
And a simple half‑cooked fried egg tucked inside.
If it's breakfast, well, that's about it.

嘉祥: "You guys, today you're finally going home, right?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "そうですね、えっと……"
He double‑checked the receipt he had received.
Minaduki Kashou: "...It seems like what I ordered is different."
Dishware Vendor: "...Eh, really?"
Dishware Vendor: "So you mean the items are wrong…?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No, it looks like what I ordered is indeed there..."
He turned his gaze toward the stack of cardboard boxes in the shop.
A small shop filled with piles upon piles of cardboard boxes. The shop was almost entirely covered in cardboard.
Minaduki Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need that many dishes here…"
Dishware Vendor: "I-I'm sorry! I'll check with headquarters right away!"
Dishware Vendor: "Could you please wait a moment?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
食器業者: "It seems this was a mistake on our part, and it got mixed up with another order..."

食器業者: "We think you, Mr. Minaduki, will need them soon as well..."

食器業者: "If it's alright, we'd like you to accept the dishes you ordered..."

嘉祥: "You want me to receive the order…"

嘉祥: "...Huh? From this pile?"

A towering stack of cardboard boxes. I can't help but be at a loss for words. They are all identical boxes, so until you open them you don't know what's inside. And when you look at the invoices, they are all top‑grade tea sets and dishes. So if we don't handle them with utmost care, it could become a disaster.

嘉祥: "Um, I do have opening preparations to make, so I'd be glad to receive them today, but…"

嘉祥: "...If I take all of these now, it'll take a considerable amount of time, right?"

仕分け終わった食器を横目に、
reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Look, you don't need to put all this pressure on me...」
From looks of it, it would take two hours or more...
But to have it redelivered would take double the effort, too...
[Kashou]: 「...... Hmm?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Stare.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right, I have a lifeline!!」

[Tableware Seller]: 「Thank you! Thank you oh so very much!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Well then, I'll be on my way!」
[Kashou]: 「... Haah, I'm exhausted...」
I glanced at the tableware we had finished organizing...
ModelAnswer:
[Dishware Vendor]: "I also have to go on the next delivery…!"
Kashou: "Even if you put that kind of pressure on me…"
It would still take about two hours even if I look at it lightly…
And even if I ask for a re-delivery, it's double trouble…
Kashou: "…………huh?"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Gee."
Kashou: "I got the cat's paw!!"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Meow meow!? Is that a cat?!"
Dishware Vendor: "The cats really helped a lot!"
Dishware Vendor: "Thank you, thank you so much!"
Dishware Vendor: "Well then, I'll take my leave with this!"

After sorting the dishes, looking over them from the side,

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "...If only cats could live so simply, things would be easier, I guess."
He looked at the shop name on the window, shook off a grimace, and began putting away the newly arrived tea set.
Vanilla: "Huh, that takoyaki place isn't here today."
The evening street was the same as yesterday's, but there were no stalls. No one was home to send the cats back, and I had left the house key in my pocket. So I'll shop while waiting for Shigure to return.
Chocola: "...Huh? Oh, sorry Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it again... was it catnip?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you take a short rest?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little..."
Chocola: "But I'm fine. Sorry for worrying you, Master."
Minaduki Kashou: "...It's not like I need to apologize."
He bowed with a troubled smile.
He already knows the reason she's feeling down.
So he has no choice but to stay silent.
Minaduki Kashou: "Well then, there's a bench right there; why don't you rest for a bit?"
Vanilla: "Then I'll go get something to drink."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ah, please. For everyone."
Vanilla: "Got it. I'm on it."
He handed Vanilla some small change and urged Chocola toward the bench.
The sea breeze that blows through the park makes the trees rustle.

Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...
I lovingly rubbed their heads, disheveling their hair.
[Kashou]: 「All right, why don't we head back to the shopping district then?」
[Chocola]: 「Eh? Why is that? Aren't you done with shopping already?」

Kashou: "...Did you guys eat only stuff like that when you were at your parents' house?"
Feeling a bit uneasy about where we were headed, I affectionately patted the two heads.
Kashou: "Alright then, let's head back to the shopping district."
Chocola: "Huh? Why? We already finished shopping, right?"
Kashou: "We gotta buy your favorite shampoo, don't we?"

Vanilla: "While we're at it, let's buy Matsuzaka beef too."

She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Thanks to Shigure, there have been times when the number of customers exceeded expectations."
Shigure: "Oh, what are you talking about?"
I decided not to pursue it further, and Shigure chuckled softly, tilting her head in response. If she were going to answer honestly, she'd say it directly. That too is a trait of Shigure since long ago.
Shigure: "I understand what you, older brother-sama, are saying."
Shigure: "But cats are clever children. They can become part of a human family and even partners."
Shigure: "...that's why."
I pause for a breath. She smiles in a troubled way and looks at me.
Shigure: "...I think it's surely lonely not to be able to rely on yourself, you know?"
Her smile makes my chest ache.

reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
She squints at the phone screen.

Watching Shigure who remains still, she guesses the caller.

Kashou: "It's from home, right? I need to answer quickly."

Shigure: "...I understand even without a purpose. You came out without telling me where you're going."

The phone in Shigure's hand stops ringing.

Likewise, Shigure remains silent and grips the phone tightly.

Shigure: "...Is it because I'm still a girl who hasn't reached adulthood?"

Shigure: "Or is it because I'm an ignorant child of the world?"

Shigure: "...So I must obey what my father and mother say, then?"

Shigure: "...I want to stay here."

Shigure: "At least when my brother is suffering... even if I can just be by his side..."

Question:

[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。

つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
From the very beginning of the day, I can't wrap my head around this unexpected sight.

Shigure: "Good morning, older brother."

Shigure: "I've been thinking about various things regarding this incident."

A bright, cloudless smile.

The other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.

While feeling a cold sweat running down my back,

Kashou: "Haa... you say you've thought, about what..."

I can only manage to say that.

Shigure: "Through this incident, I realized how difficult it is for you not to overexert yourself."

Shigure: "But as your sister, it's also true that I've been worried so much I can't sleep at night..."

Shigure: "Therefore, increasing the staff to reduce your burden is the best strategy, and that's what I thought."

Kashou: "............ haa"

メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」

reference_answer:

Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.

Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—

My body freezes up from the tension.

This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.

[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」

[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I became tense and stiffened my body.  
The cats also held their breath.  

Shihama: "… hum"  
This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.

Shigure: "N-no, that’s not…."

Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。

[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I told them that and then left the house of Mizunagi, as if I was running away.  
A thousand thoughts raced through my head, making my mind all tangled up.  
Before I realized it, I was in a park at night.

嘉祥: "Ah…"

I had put the key to the house and my wallet into my bag and left them behind.

嘉祥: "...What am I doing?"

ショコラ: "...Master."

嘉祥: "Shocola…!"

バニラ: "Master, you forgot something."

In Vanilla's hand was my bag.

嘉祥: "Did you bring it back for me, Vanilla?"

バニラ: "Of course. Sleeping in the woods would be troublesome."

嘉祥: "That makes sense."

If there were no key, not only I but also the two of us wouldn't be able to get into the house.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I had something I wanted to ask my supplier. It wasn't urgent, but it would be better to call early.

For a privately run patisserie, that's probably normal, but I negotiate with each of my suppliers myself. Even ingredients that aren't widely distributed can be sold by farmers if I'm buying in bulk.

The search for flavor was also a journey to find ingredients.

Talking about work while everyone else is enjoying tourism feels out of place, so I said I had personal business and left the room. To be safe, I stepped out of the inn and decided to talk somewhere quiet.

I made the call.

嘉祥: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
嘉祥: "ふぅ……"

They were surprised by an order from abroad, but they seemed willing to ship it somehow. I returned to the inn.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Which one, shall we try one?"

He bought a hot spring manjū at the stall. It's freshly made and steaming. When he bites it, it's fluffy and more moist than expected. On his tongue, the sweet red bean paste crumbles softly, spreading sweetness.

Kashou: "I see… hofu hofu… this is delicious." Neither his Western pastries nor the family Japanese sweets are ever served warm. Eating a steaming manjū while saying hofu hofu was an interesting experience.

Kashou: "By the way, I've come to the hot spring town several times… but never ate it." Because there were no cats back then. Even when traveling with parents, Shigure and me, we didn't talk about buying snacks.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」

Sounds like a plan, then.

Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」

[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.

That was how it turned out.
Shigure: "Well then, with feelings for Brother-sama..."
When she started singing, the atmosphere changed.
Shigure: "~~~~♪"
Kashou: "... amazing."
Shigure: "Ha~, I sang a big voice after a long time."
Kashou: "You're insanely good!"
He said clearly it was pro level. I gave generous applause.

Question:
[アズキ]: 「外靴がなかったからな。普通じゃねーだろ、こんな夜中に？」

[アズキ]: 「悩みって、まだコンビニスイーツのことで？」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや、さすがに、それはもう大丈夫だ」
[嘉祥]: 「ただ、今までのことを思い出して……自分には何が足りないのだろう、と考えてみたりさ」
[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」
[嘉祥]: 「卒業して、何の選択肢もなく家業を継ぐのが、どうにも釈然としなくて。自分の見識を広げたかったんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「勘違いしないでほしいんだけど……水無月の和菓子が嫌いなわけじゃないからな？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "I didn't have any outdoor shoes. Isn't it weird to be out like this at night?"
Minaduki: "I'm sorry… I really was just looking for a change of pace."
Azuki: "Are you still worried about the convenience store sweets?"
Minaduki: "No, no. That's already fine."
Minaduki: "But I've been thinking about everything up to now… wondering what I'm missing in myself."
Azuki: "What about your past, Minaduki?"
Minaduki: "...After graduating from university, I went to study abroad in France."
Minaduki: "I graduated and had no options but to take over the family business, which just didn't sit right with me. I wanted to broaden my horizons."
Minaduki: "Don't misunderstand—I'm not saying I hate Mizunagatsu's wagashi."

[Kashou]: 「I thought to myself that this was exactly what I was in search of.」

[Kashou]: 「When my study abroad was nearing an end... my mentor told me, 'I've already taught you everything.'」
[Kashou]: 「Although, personally, I don't feel as though I've matched my mentor's distinct flavor in the slightest...」

Minaduki Kashou: "When my study abroad was almost over—my master told me that he had already taught me everything."

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「恋ネコなんだから……」
[メイプル]: 「あたしも……声かけるし……」
[嘉祥]: 「あぁ……そうするよ」
[嘉祥]: 「本当にありがとうな、２匹とも」
メイプルとシナモンの汗ばんだ頬をそっと撫でる。
すると、２匹はくすぐったそうに微笑むのだった。
[嘉祥]: 「遅くなったから、送っていくよ」
[メイプル]: 「大丈夫よ。まだ電車もあるし」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さんのほうが、心配ですから～」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……気をつけてな」
[メイプル]: 「ありがと。嘉祥、今夜はゆっくり休んでね」
[シナモン]: 「おやすみなさいませ、嘉祥さん～」
[メイプル]: 「あたしたちが、あそこまでサービスしてあげたんだから、ぐっすり寝ないと承知しないわよ？」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Remember, we're your catpanions...」
[Maple]: 「I'll... let you know, too...」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... I will.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you, you two. Really.」
I softly stroke Maple and Cinnamon's sweat-drenched cheeks.
Once I do, the two smile as if tickled by my touch.
[Kashou]: 「It's gotten late, so I'll drop you guys off.」
[Maple]: 「It's fine. There are still trains running.」
[Cinnamon]: 「We are more worried about you, after all, Kashou-san~」
[Kashou]: 「I see... Well, take care.」
[Maple]: 「Thanks. You take it easy tonight, Kashou.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Have a good night, Kashou-san~」
[Maple]: 「After all the service that we gave to you, you'd better get a good night's sleep, all right?」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Because I'm a love cat..."
Maple: "I also... will talk to them..."
Kashou: "Ah… I'll do that."
Kashou: "Thank you really, both of you."

Maple and Cinnamon's sweat-soaked cheeks are gently stroked. Then the two smile as if tickled.

Kashou: "Sorry I'm late, I'll escort you."
Maple: "It's okay. There's still a train."
Cinnamon: "Kashou-san is more worried, after all~"
Kashou: "I see… take care."
Maple: "Thanks. Kashou, rest well tonight."
Cinnamon: "Good night, Kashou-san~"
Maple: "Since we served you up to that point, you must sleep soundly or I won't accept it!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[メイプル]: 「あたしたちは、嘉祥ほど努力してきてないんだから、ケーキ作りで役に立たないのはしょうがないのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「うん……君たちは充分に頑張ってくれている」
[嘉祥]: 「むしろ、君たちがいるから、俺は決断できるんだ」
[シナモン]: 「なにをでしょうか……？」
[嘉祥]: 「店を任せたい」
[メイプル]: 「えっ！？　ど、どういうこと……！？」
[シナモン]: 「嘉祥さん、いなくなっちゃうんですか～～～！？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、１週間……いや、３日でいい……俺に時間をくれないか？」
[メイプル]: 「山籠もりでもするつもりなの？」
[シナモン]: 「あ、修行～！？　修行ですか～！？　滝に打たれて、閃くやつですね～～～！？」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We haven't put in the same amount of effort that Kashou has, so not being able to help him bake his cake is nothing to be ashamed of.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... You two have done more than enough to help anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「In fact, because of you two being here for me, I'm able to make my decision.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Decision on what...?」
[Kashou]: 「I want to let you run the shop.」
[Maple]: 「Huh?! Wh-What do you mean...?!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Kashou-san, you're going to be leaving~?!」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, for a week... No, three days at best... Will you let me have that much time?」
[Maple]: 「Are you going to go isolate yourself in the mountains or something?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ah, training~?! You're going to train~?! Coming up with revelations as you sit under a waterfall and all that~?!」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "We haven't worked as hard as Kashou, so it's only natural that we're useless at making cakes."

Kashou: "Yeah… you two have been working hard enough."

Kashou: "In fact, because of you guys, I can make decisions."

Cinnamon: "What is it…?"

Kashou: "I want to leave the shop in your hands."

Maple: "Eh!? Wh-what does that mean…?!"

Cinnamon: "Kashou-san, are you going to disappear~~!?"

Kashou: "Ah, one week… no, three days is fine… can you give me some time?"

Maple: "Are you planning to seclude yourself in a mountain cave or something?"

Cinnamon: "Ah, training~!? Training, huh~? Being struck by a waterfall and then having an epiphany, right~~!?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「まぁ、そうよね」
[シナモン]: 「ううぅ……寒そうですね～」
[嘉祥]: 「それに、山籠もりしても、美味しいケーキは作れないと思うし……」
[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなくて、俺はフランスに渡ろうと思う」
[メイプル]: 「あ、そういうことね」
[シナモン]: 「え？　え？　フランス～？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は師匠に、もう一度、教えを請いたい」
[シナモン]: 「あ、なるほどです～」
[嘉祥]: 「ここ数日……もがいて、もがいて、自分の中の全てをぶちまけてみたけれど……」
[嘉祥]: 「結局、親父に言われたことは理解できなかったよ。それこそが芯がないってことなのかもしれないけど」
[嘉祥]: 「このままじゃ、何も変えられそうにない」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Yeah, fair point.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Unghh... I'm cold just thinking of it~」
[Kashou]: 「Plus, I don't think isolating myself in the mountains would help me bake any good cakes...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean I plan on taking a trip to France.」
[Maple]: 「Ah, that makes sense.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Huh? Huh? France~?」
[Kashou]: 「I want to ask my mentor to teach me again.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ah, that does make sense~」
[Kashou]: 「For the past few days... I've been struggling and struggling, and I've tried everything and the kitchen sink, but...」
[Kashou]: 「In the end, I was never able to figure out what my dad told me. That in itself may be what he meant by me lacking a 'core' to my cooking.」
[Kashou]: 「But I know one thing—I don't see any change happening at this pace.」
ModelAnswer:
メイプル: "Well, that's right."
シナモン: "Uuu... It looks cold~"
嘉祥: "Besides, even if I shut myself away in the mountains, I don't think I can make a tasty cake..."
嘉祥: "That's not it. I'm thinking of going to France."
メイプル: "Ah, so that's what you mean."
シナモン: "Huh? Huh? France~?"
嘉祥: "I want to ask my master for instruction again."
シナモン: "Ah, I see~"
嘉祥: "These past few days... I've struggled and struggled, trying to pour everything out of myself..."
嘉祥: "In the end, I couldn't understand what my father told me. Maybe that's why I'm lacking a core."
嘉祥: "At this rate, nothing seems like it can change."

[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「仕方ないわね、店番も必要だし。なにより、嘉祥だって遊びに行くわけじゃないわ」
[嘉祥]: 「すまないが、店は休みにしたくないんだ。温泉のときに休業してるからな」
何度も臨時休業を入れていると、お客さんが来てくれなくなってしまう。
[メイプル]: 「そりゃそうよね」
[シナモン]: 「お店に行ってみて、お休みだと、ガッカリしちゃいますからねぇ～」
[メイプル]: 「いいわ。嘉祥がいない間は、あたしが責任を持って、お店を回してあげる」
[シナモン]: 「わぁ～、メーちゃん、たのもしい～！」
[メイプル]: 「まぁ……ケーキを作るのは、アズキに任せるけど」
[嘉祥]: 「はは……用意はしておくよ」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「You'll get over it. You need to be here to look after the shop. More importantly, this isn't going to be a leisure trip for Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm sorry, but I don't want the shop to close up in the meantime. It was closed the entire time during that hot spring trip and all.」
If we keep temporarily closing up the shop, then it's bound to dissuade customers from coming.
[Maple]: 「Totally agree.」
[Cinnamon]: 「It would be a big disappointment if someone took the trip out to the shop only to find out it was closed, after all~」
[Maple]: 「Okay, then. I'll take charge while you're away and keep the shop running.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Wow~ We can always depend on you, May-chan~!」
[Maple]: 「If you say so... Azuki is going to be in charge of making the cakes, though.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahaha... I'll make sure everything is in order, then.」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "There's no choice, we need a shop attendant. More importantly, Kazashou isn't going to just play around."
Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry, but I don't want the shop closed. We already close during the hot spring season."
If you keep putting in temporary closures, customers will stop coming.
Maple: "That's true."
Cinnamon: "When we go to the shop and it's closed, people get disappointed, you know~"
Maple: "Fine. While Kazashou is away, I'll take responsibility and run the shop."
Cinnamon: "Wow~ Me-chan, that's so helpful~!"
Maple: "Well... making cakes will be left to Azuki."
Minaduki Kashou: "Ha ha… I'll prepare for it."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
って、そんなわけあるか！いくら俺でも、妹のことを見間違えたりはしない。
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」
[時雨]: 「……見つかってしまいましたか。兄様」
[時雨]: 「現地の人たちに、完璧に溶けこんだつもりだったのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "What? Is that even possible! Even if I'm the one, I wouldn't mistake my little sister for someone else."
KASHOU: "What are you doing, Shigure…?"
SHIGURE: "...Did you find me? Brother-sama"
SHIGURE: "I thought I had blended in perfectly with the locals here."
KASHOU: "No… even in Paris, a dress like that—so aristocratic—doesn't really look common…"
Paris has many stone-paved streets and stairs, so high heels are risky. Many women wear sneakers or leather shoes instead.
And most women wear slim jeans; skirts are rare.
Clothes tend to be black or white. Beige or patterned outerwear is usually worn by sleepy tourists.
SHIGURE: "That's a shame… I thought it was perfect."
KASHOU: "Well, that look does suit you, so it's fine, don't you think?"

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「に、似合ってる……？　似合ってますか、兄様……！？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、ああ……いつも和服だから、ちょっと新鮮というか……」
[時雨]: 「ああ……」
[時雨]: 「パリまで来て、大正解です！　私の人生に一片の悔いもありません！」
[時雨]: 「たとえ、地中海の藻屑となろうとも！」
[嘉祥]: 「大袈裟すぎる」
[嘉祥]: 「というか、どうして時雨が、ここに？」
[時雨]: 「それは、もちろん」
[時雨]: 「兄様への、愛ゆえに！」
[嘉祥]: 「……俺は、この数日で、何かを掴まなきゃいけない。わかるな？」
[時雨]: 「はい、もちろんです！」
[時雨]: 「私は、そのお手伝いをするために、やって参りました」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I-It looks nice on me...? Do you think it looks nice on me, Nii-sama...?!」
[Kashou]: 「Y-Yeah... You're always in kimonos, so I guess you could say it's a breath of fresh air...」
[Shigure]: 「Aah...」
[Shigure]: 「I was right in coming all the way to Paris! I have not a scrap of regret in my life now!」
[Shigure]: 「I could die in the Mediterranean now, for all I care!」
[Kashou]: 「You're exaggerating way too much.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, what are you doing here anyway?」
[Shigure]: 「That is obvious.」
[Shigure]: 「Because of my love for you, Nii-sama!」
[Kashou]: 「...I have to figure things out in the few days I have. You understand that, right?」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, of course I do!」
[Shigure]: 「I have come here in order to assist you in your journey.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "N-nice...? Does it suit you, older brother...?!"

Kashou: "Ah, ah... since I'm always in kimonos, it's a bit fresh or something..."

Shigure: "Ah..."

Shigure: "Coming all the way to Paris was the perfect choice! I have no regrets in my life!"

Shigure: "Even if I become seaweed debris of the Mediterranean!"

Kashou: "You're being too dramatic."

Kashou: "I mean, why is Shigure here?"

Shigure: "That's, of course"

Shigure: "Because of my love for you, older brother!"

Kashou: "...I have to grasp something in these few days. You understand, right?"

Shigure: "Yes, of course!"

Shigure: "I'm here to help you with that."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うーん……」
こうして話をしていることが、もうすでに俺の予定と違っているわけだが……
いや、こう感じるのも、俺の精神的な余裕がなくなっているせいなのか？
俺のことを心配して、フランスまで来てくれたのだ。時雨だって、自分の生活があるのに。
とはいえ、素直にお礼を言えるほど大人にもなれなかった。
[嘉祥]: 「追い返したりはしないが……今回は遊びの旅行じゃない」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のために、何もしてあげられないと思う。それでもいいのか？」
[時雨]: 「望むところです。私は、兄様に目的に集中してほしいのです」
[時雨]: 「ですから、雑務は全てお任せください」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか」
[時雨]: 「ところで兄様、もう師匠様のお店へ向かわれるのですか？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hmm...」
The fact that we're talking right now is already so far removed from my initial plans, though...
Then again, maybe the reason I'm feeling this way is because my mental composure is wearing thin?
Shigure felt worried enough about me to come all the way to France. Even though she has her own life to lead.
Nonetheless, I'm not even mature enough to be forthright and give her my thanks.
[Kashou]: 「I won't turn you away, but... this isn't a pleasure trip.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I'll be able to do anything for you here. You're fine in spite of that?」
[Shigure]: 「That is just fine. I want you to focus on your goal.」
[Shigure]: 「So, please, allow me to handle any miscellaneous tasks.」
[Kashou]: 「I see.」
[Shigure]: 「By the way, Nii-sama, shouldn't you be heading to your mentor's shop now?」

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それに……留学していた頃は……兄様がずっと戻ってこない可能性も、ありましたから」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、なるほど」
俺が洋菓子の道に進んだことで、父親との仲は冷えこんでいた。
留学が終わっても、パリに留まるという可能性も、充分にあったわけだ。
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、日本で店を開くことは、決めていたんだが……」
[時雨]: 「何か理由があるのでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり……親父から逃げた、なんて思われたくなかった。俺にも意地がある」
[嘉祥]: 「あと、師匠に言われたんだよ。ちゃんと父親と話し合ったほうがいい。日本に戻りなさい、って」
[時雨]: 「師匠様が……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、師匠の味を、俺の生まれ故郷の街に伝えるのも、けっこう意味のあることだと思ってる」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Also... when you were still studying abroad... there was a chance that you would never come back to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I see now.」
By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」
[Shigure]: 「Was there any reason behind that decision?」
[Kashou]: 「Well... I didn't want people to think that I ran away from Dad. I have my pride.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, my mentor told me to. She said that I should talk it out with my dad and return to Japan.」
[Shigure]: 「Your mentor...」

Question:

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "In France, eating cake during meals is just a normal thing."
Minaduki Kashou: "Even in ordinary households, dinner is served like this—salad, soup, bread, fish dishes, meat dishes, cheese, dessert..."
"How many plates are used varies by household."
Minaduki Shigure: "Every day feels like French cuisine, doesn't it?"
Minaduki Kashou: "So people who eat cake almost every day aren't that uncommon."
Minaduki Shigure: "Hmm... I see..."
Minaduki Shigure: "It feels strange somehow. A family having a course meal?"
Minaduki Kashou: "No, no... Even ordinary Japanese home cooking, from someone in another country, looks like kaiseki cuisine."
Minaduki Kashou: "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish... the number of plates used isn't that different, right?"
Minaduki Shigure: "When you put it that way..."

[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "...I am not Kashou's father, so I don't know. It might be that way, or it might not."
Beignet: "Words can even be incomprehensible to the person who said them."
Beignet: "If a hundred people receive it, there are a hundred interpretations—that's what words are."
Beignet: "What's important isn't the words..."
Beignet: "No... I talked too much, didn't I?"
Beignet: "After a long trip and working constantly, you must be tired. Take a shower and go to bed early."
Beignet: "Ah... I was careless. There are empty rooms, but the beds that are free are only those Kashou used."
Beignet: "Would it be okay if you use them together?"

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "When you say that..."
Shigure: "If you open the window every day and don't sweep the dust, it'll become moldy quickly."
Kashou: "Is that so?"
Shigure: "My brother's room in my parents' house is kept in perfect condition because I take care of it daily."
Shigure: "I open the window, let fresh air in, wipe the desk dry, and check the bed's comfort."
Kashou: "Th-that's right."

The bed's comfort needs to be checked every day…?

Shigure: "I think Beignet-san has been waiting for my brother to come again."
Kashou: "Is that so…"

[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」

[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Kashou: "That’s impossible. Shower quickly."
Minaduki Shigure: "Okay."

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
時雨: "There is no doubt about it. Because many people looked up information after it became a topic, and because it was highly rated as a famous shop. It's a synergistic effect."

嘉祥: "As for me, I'm glad that more people learned about Master’s wonderful cake."

フレーズ: "Uuu… If tomorrow goes like this, it might be a bit tough."

ベニエ: "Today was special, I'm sure."

フレーズ: "That's right… Tomorrow, it’ll just be the pastry chef and me again."

We were scheduled to depart tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is seven hours. To return home within the promised three days, we had to leave at that time.

In the end, I still didn't know what was lacking in me.

Emotionally, I had become quite relaxed, though…

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」

Beignet: "...That's right."

Beignet: "Hehe… was that so?"

Beignet: "...This shop has been in my family since my grandmother's generation, and we've always made cakes."
Beignet: "It may not be as grand as Kashou's house, but I believe there's a tradition that must be preserved."

[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」

Question:

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Shigure: "No! It's not just words..."
Minaduki Kashou: "No, the real reason deep in my heart... I've been thinking deeply about my own feelings."
Minaduki Kashou: "In the end, I'm... I want my father to recognize me."
Minaduki Kashou: "At an old age, is this not a rebellious phase?"
Minaduki Kashou: "I'm probably an egotist full of approval-seeking desire, surely."
Minaduki Kashou: "Sorry, Shigure... Did I disappoint you…?"
Minaduki Shigure: "So that's why Brother-sama is making Western sweets?"
Minaduki Kashou: "If it weren't for that, even if my father had denied me, I wouldn't have worried so much."
Minaduki Shigure: "Perhaps there might be such feelings."

Question:

[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。

しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Phew… we’re quite late."
Minaduki Shigure: "Indeed. I thought we could return for dinner."
The flight arrived a bit late, and we came home at night.
Since the cats were probably still in the shop, Shigure decided to go to La Soleil with me instead of staying at the Minaduki house.
Minaduki Kashou: "This pilgrimage was really tough."
Moreover, there were many standing jobs over there.
Minaduki Shigure: "I’m perfectly fine. No need for your concern, brother-sama."
She smiled bravely, but she couldn’t hide the signs of fatigue.
Minaduki Kashou: "You should rest at home. If you want, stay overnight; we can go back tomorrow."
Minaduki Shigure: "You’re offering me a place to stay!?"

[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」

reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.

写真は入っていないようだ。

reference_answer:

[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
